Texts.Eng:
Demons... What more is there to say, they like fire, and have horns and tails

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Health x^green;1.15^reset;, Defense x^green;1.1^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;40^reset;% Shadow, +^green;40^reset;% Fire
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Moderate Heat, Burning

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  ^green;Hot^reset; biomes: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;15^reset;% Speed
  ^red;Cold^reset; biomes: Health x^red;0.85^reset;, Energy x^red;0.9^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Shortswords or Daggers: +^green;10^reset;% Crit Damage
  Longsword, Broadsword, or Katana: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;
  Spear: +^green;1.5^reset;% Crit Chance, +^green;15^reset;% Crit Damage
  2x Small Blades: Defense x^green;1.12^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% Movement Speed

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;40^reset;% Ice, Cosmic
Texts.Chs:
该死。。。还有什么要说的，他们喜欢火，有角和尾巴；饮食^reset;：杂食性

 ^orange;天赋^reset;：
生命值x ^green;1.15 ^reset;，防御x ^green;1.1 ^reset;
 ^green;抗性^reset;：+^green;40 ^reset;%暗影抗性，+^green;40 ^reset;%火抗
^cyan;免疫^reset;：中等炎热，燃烧

^orange;环境^reset;：
 ^green;炎热热^reset;生物群落：伤害x ^green;1.1 ^reset;+^green;15 ^reset;%速度
 ^red;寒冷^reset;生物群系：生命值x ^red;0.85 ^reset;，能量x ^red;0.9 ^reset;

^orange;武器^reset;：
短剑或匕首：+^green;10 ^reset;%暴击伤害
长剑、长剑或卡塔纳武器：伤害x ^green;1.1 ^reset;
矛：+^green;1.5 ^reset;%暴击率，+^green;15 ^reset;%暴击伤害
 双持小刀：防御x ^green;1.12 ^reset;+^green;5 ^reset;%移动速度

^red；弱点^reset;：
 ^red;抗性^reset;：-^red;40 ^reset;%冰抗，宇宙射线抗性
